full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: WS4256569559-4256622621

**Publication Date**: 29 November 2023

## Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4256569559
* **Tender Closing Date**: 1 February 2024 at 14:00 Eastern Time
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and 10 other agreements.
* **Locations**: Nunavut Territory
* **End User**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

## Purpose of Tender
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), issues this tender to solicit proposals from qualified service providers to conduct legal surveys of various locations throughout Nunavut Territories. The tender is for services of a Canada Lands Surveyor (CLS) as defined by the Association of Canada Lands Surveyors.

## Description of Services Required
The services are required to be performed in accordance with the Canada Lands Surveyors Act, Canada Lands Surveyors Regulations (SOR/99-142), the National Standards for the Survey of Canada Lands, and any other code of territorial or local application for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans. The services will involve conducting eighteen (18) legal surveys of various locations throughout Nunavut Territories.

## How to Obtain a Copy of the Solicitation Document
The solicitation document, including the statement of work and technical specifications, is available on the Ariba Discovery website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18123068.

## Contact Information for Bidders
All inquiries related to this tender must be directed to Onwuama Ezechinedu, Nkechi (SPAC/PSPC) by email at nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Important Dates
* Tender Closing Date: 1 February 2024 at 14:00 Eastern Time
* Expected Contract Start Date: 15 March 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 August 2025
